item.title: Lenovo Legion Y530 Gaming...
item.dc:creator: qwerty
item.description: The bulky gaming laptops of old are gone, and now is the time to embrace a machine that is worthy of you—stylish on the outside, savage on the inside. At 24 mm and 2.3 kg, the Lenovo Legion Y530 Laptop was redesigned to deliver the ideal balance between epic gaming performance and practical portability. Take […]
item.content:encoded:
The bulky gaming laptops of old are gone, and now is the time to embrace a machine that is worthy of you—stylish on the outside, savage on the inside. At 24 mm and 2.3 kg, the Lenovo Legion Y530 Laptop was redesigned to deliver the ideal balance between epic gaming performance and practical portability.

Take your games to the edge

 

With its thin bezels, the Y530 packs more than 2 million pixels into a near-edgeless 15-inch FHD display. Combined with up to 144 Hz refresh rate, 300 nits of brightness, and an IPS Antiglare screen, this laptop brings your favorite games to life, for breathtakingly immersive gameplay on the go.

Designed for what’s next

The Y530 features Intel’s high-performance 8th Gen Intel® Core mobile processors, delivering the ultimate on-the-go performance with support for Intel® Optane Technology—optimized to game the way you do, with up to six cores and 12 threads for high-end gaming and pro-level content creation.

Essential graphics for every gamer

 

  • The Y530 is a true gaming rig, powered by NVIDIA® Pascal-the most advanced GPU architecture ever created. This advanced GPU boosts performance in high-definition and supports DirectX12 features to deliver super-fast, smooth and power-efficient gameplay. The Y530 comes loaded with even more innovative NVIDIA® game-ready technologies that let you experience the latest titles in their full immersive glory.

More muscle per millimeter

Expert craftsmanship extends beyond design. The Y530 represents the culmination of thousands of engineering hours to deliver a laptop that is both powerful and thin. Incorporating DDR4 memory, PCIe SSD storage, and more, our engineers combined their expertise in battery, I/O placement, thermals, and motherboard design to pack the best hardware into one powerful gaming laptop.

Precision keys for precision commands

Your keyboard is the first and last thing you’ll touch during a serious gaming session, so its details matter. The Y530 delivers a full-sized, white-backlit, high-response keyboard and number pad with 1.7 mm of key travel, for the most ergonomic and comfortable gaming experience.

Run silent, run cool

Heat, the nemesis of gaming performance, is not a problem with the remastered Y530. It features a dual-channel thermal system, offering multiple benefits: individual CPU and GPU cooling, for cooler system temperatures; four thermal vents, for improved airflow; and 70 individual fan blades per channel, to reduce system noise.

Get more from your entertainment

Dolby Audio Premium energizes your entertainment with rich, powerful sound. It dynamically adjusts audio to deliver home theater quality in a virtual surround sound experience for all your entertainment. Boosted bass and enhanced volume turn it all up for sound that’s loud and clear enough to share.

Tech Specs

Processor
  • 8th Generation Intel® Core i7-8750H
Operating System
Windows 10 Home
Display
15.6″ FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS (up to 144 Hz, 300 nits)
Graphics
  • NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050Ti
Battery
52.5 WHr
Memory
16GB DDR4 2666 MHz
Storage
  •  1TB HDD 16GB Intel® Optane-Ready
Audio
Harman® speakers with Dolby Audio
Ports
  • 3 USB 3.1 Type-A
  • USB 3.1 Type-C
  • Mini DisplayPort 1.4
  • HDMI 2.0
  • RJ-45
  • Audio combo jack
  • NOVO hole
Connectivity
  • WiFi 2×2 AC + Bluetooth® 4.2
  • WiFi 1×1 AC + Bluetooth® 5.0
Dimensions (W x D x H) 14.37″ x 10.24″ x 0.95″ (365 mm x 260 mm x 24.2 mm)
Weight Starting at 5.1 lbs (2.3 kg)

item.title: HP PAVILION 14 BK002NE 2CH75EA...
item.dc:creator: qwerty
item.description: HP Pavilion laptop sports a stunning silver finish. You can buy this HP Windows 10 laptop here at Souq.com.The HP Pavilion 14-bk002ne Laptop is loaded with powerful features. With its modern and sophisticated design, this HP laptop maintains the perfect balance between style and performance. The 14inch display delivers lifelike visuals at an impressive resolution […]
item.content:encoded:
HP Pavilion laptop sports a stunning silver finish. You can buy this HP Windows 10 laptop here at Souq.com.The HP Pavilion 14-bk002ne Laptop is loaded with powerful features. With its modern and sophisticated design, this HP laptop maintains the perfect balance between style and performance. The 14inch display delivers lifelike visuals at an impressive resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels. With up to 10 hours 25 minutes of battery life, you will never have to rush to the charger in the middle of the presentation. This HP Pavilion laptop is preinstalled with Windows 10 operating system that offers a familiar feel and a host of exciting features so that you can work confidently and creatively. The Intel Core i5-7200U Dual-Core processor give this laptop enough firepower to speed through all high-end tasks. Furthermore, the NVIDIA GeForce 940MX graphics card accelerates the performance of the system to handle demanding games and editing applications. This HP Windows 10 laptop incorporates a 12GB RAM that delivers flawless multitasking. Moreover, the internal memory of 1TB allows you to save loads of files without the worry of running out of space. Available in a silver finish, this HP i5 laptop exudes a polished and sharp look.

PHYSICAL FEATURES

KEY FEATURES

Intel Core i5-7200U

IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE

  • 14inch display delivers crystal-clear images and visuals with a vibrant quality of 2 million pixels
  • Impressive resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels gives all your favorite media content a new dimension
  • IPS technology provides excellent clarity even from wide angles
  • Anti-glare coating on the display gives you a clear view even when you are working under a bright light
  • Dual HP Speakers, custom tuning by the experts at B and O PLAY and HP Audio Boost give you a rich, authentic audio experience

UNMATCHED PERFORMANCE

  • 7th generation, Intel Core i5-7200U Dual-Core processor offers excellent efficiency, no matter the task
  • 12GB DDR4 SDRAM module offers incredible responsiveness to give you a seamless multitasking experience
  • 1TB internal memory allows you to store large files and high-end games without the worry of running out of space
  • NVIDIA GeForce 940MX graphics adapter enhances the visual performance of the system without hampering the battery life
  • 3-cell, 41Whr Li-Ion, with battery fast-charge support, can charge from 0 to 90 percent in just 90 minutes
  • Windows 10, with its updated features, new innovations, and security capabilities, gives you an incredible user experience

FASTER AND VERSATILE CONNECTIVITY

  • USB 3.1 Type-C Gen 1 allows you to share data with USB Type-C enabled devices at incredible speeds
  • 2 USB 3.1 Gen 1 ports lets you plug in external flash drives and HDDs
  • HDMI port for sharing laptop screen with high-end displays and projectors
  • Intel 802.11b/g/n/ac WiFi allows you to access the home internet for fast downloading and video streaming

item.content:encoded: Flip into action: With an innovative 360-degree hinge, the versatile and lightweight Inspiron 5000 series 2-in-1 allows you to switch easily between four different modes. Tent mode is perfect for using recipes in real time, stand mode for movies on the airplane, laptop mode for typing your novel or emailing work, and tablet mode makes reading while you’re reclined easier than ever

item.title: Dell Inspiron 3567 Core i3-7130U...
item.dc:creator: qwerty
item.description: Dependable, this Dell Inspiron 15 Intel Core i3-7130U 8GB 1TB HDD 15.6″ HD LED Win 10 Laptop has it all. That includes a 1TB hard drive with loads of room for valuable documents and pictures as well as an Intel Core i3 processor and 8GB RAM that team up to speed through papers, presentations, and […]
item.content:encoded:
Dependable, this Dell Inspiron 15 Intel Core i3-7130U 8GB 1TB HDD 15.6″ HD LED Win 10 Laptop has it all. That includes a 1TB hard drive with loads of room for valuable documents and pictures as well as an Intel Core i3 processor and 8GB RAM that team up to speed through papers, presentations, and internet browsing. The ever-reliable Windows 10 operating system and a large 15.6″ display add to this laptop’s many highlights.

Features:

  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7130U Processor 2.7GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB DDR4 SDRAM Memory
  • Hard drive: 1TB 5400RPM SATA Hard Drive
  • Display: 15.6″ HD 1366×768 Anti-Glare Display
  • Video card: Intel Integrated HD 620 Graphics
  • 802.11ac Wireless and Bluetooth 4.1
  • 10/100 Ethernet LAN Port
  • HD Audio with dual speakers
  • Keyboard with numeric keypad
  • 3-in-1 Digital Media Reader
  • Headphone/microphone combo jack
  • Multi-format SD media card reader
  • Camera: Webcam with integrated microphone
  • 4-Cell Li-ion Battery
  • 2 x USB 3.1, 1 x USB 2.0, HDMI
  • Operating system: Windows 10 Home
  • Finish: Black
Screen Size 15.6 inches
Screen Resolution 1366×768
Processor 2.7 GHz Intel Core i3
RAM 8 GB
Hard Drive 1 TB mechanical_hard_drive

item.title: Dell Gaming G3-1187 Core i7...
item.dc:creator: qwerty
item.description: Dell Gaming Dell gaming machines are engineered with the specific, demanding needs of the gaming audience in mind. From the latest processor to powerful discrete graphics cards, they make every experience more intense and real. Graphically superior Powerful NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB GDDR5 graphics memory allows you to game at higher settings […]
item.content:encoded:
Dell Gaming

Dell gaming machines are engineered with the specific, demanding needs of the gaming audience in mind. From the latest processor to powerful discrete graphics cards, they make every experience more intense and real.

Graphically superior

Powerful NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB GDDR5 graphics memory allows you to game at higher settings with crystal-clear detail and smooth, realistic gameplay for a more immersive on-screen experience.

Stunning from every Angle

Gameplay appears sharp from virtually every angle on the 15.6″ screen with a wide-viewing angle with in-plane switching, and an FHD anti-glare display.

Engineered for gaming excellence

More power. Better gameplay: 8th Gen Intel core I7 processor provide responsive, powerful performance whether you’re gaming, streaming videos, or working on CPU-intensive projects.

Built for Speed

256GB Solid State Drive (Boot) + 1TB 5400RPM Hard Drive storage ensures faster performance and better reliability, and a new Ethernet port supports full 100/1000 Gigabit connections for quick performance.

Slim and stylish Powerful ports Bring the noise

Thin is in: At just 22.7mm, the slimline design is the thinnest 15-inch laptop in the Dell G Series line, making it even easier to game on the go.An HDMI port enables 60Hz 4k output. Immerse yourself in superior sound with two front-firing speakers with Waves MaxxAudio Pro.

Constructed for convenience, Charge into Battle

Light up your game: Game clearly in low-light settings with the backlit keyboard. Power up and start gaming immediately with a 56Whr battery.

NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti

NVIDIA GeForce 1050: Everyone deserves great gaming. That’s why we created the fast, powerful GeForce GTX 1050. Now, you can turn your laptop into a true gaming rig, powered by NVIDIA Pascal—the most advanced GPU architecture ever created. It’s loaded with innovative NVIDIA Game Ready technologies that let every gamer experience the latest titles in their full glory.

General

Brand DELL
Laptop Type Gaming Laptop
Laptop Touch Screen No
Colour Black
Laptop Processor Intel Core i7
Max Turbo Frequency Up To 4.0 GHz
Cache 8 MB
No of Cores 4
Laptop Memory (RAM) 16 GB RAM
Storage 1 TB HDD,256 GB SSD
Graphic Processor nVidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
Laptop Graphics Memory 4 GB
Laptop Display Size 15.6-inch
Resolution (Pixels) 1920 x 1080
3D Support Yes

OS Bit Version 64-Bit
Optical Drive DVD
Webcam Yes

Bluetooth Yes

2.0 USB Port x 1
3.0 USB Port x3
HDMI Port x1
RJ45 LAN Yes
VGA Yes
Weight 2.53 Kg

item.title: Dell Inspiron 5481 2-in-1...
item.dc:creator: qwerty
item.description: Fun and functional Myriad of modes: Your 2-in-1 is built with four flexible modes—laptop for typing, tablet for drawing or writing, and tent or media modes for easy entertainment. Your power source: With up to 8th Gen Intel® Quad Core™ processors and up to 8GB DDR4 memory, you have ample power and storage for all your […]
item.content:encoded:
Fun and functional

Myriad of modes: Your 2-in-1 is built with four flexible modes—laptop for typing, tablet for drawing or writing, and tent or media modes for easy entertainment.

Your power source: With up to 8th Gen Intel® Quad Core processors and up to 8GB DDR4 memory, you have ample power and storage for all your entertainment, projects and more.

Super storage: With options up to 1TB HDD or up to 256GB PCIe NVMe SSD, the Inspiron 14 5000 2-in-1 is ultra-reliable, with enough storage to make everything you do fast, smooth and easy.

Easy connection: You’re never out of options. A handy, full-size HDMI port lets you connect your 2-in-1 to your TV or a second monitor, while a convenient full-size SD slot lets you upload pictures in a flash.

Video: Dell Cinema (CinemaColor / CinemaSound / CinemaStream) 1:13

CinemaColor

Visuals appear every bit as vibrant as the world around you. Engineered with best-in-class panel technology, combined with advanced hardware and software to power content with a superior dynamic range – delivering the deepest blacks, the most dazzling brights and more vivid detail across the entire color spectrum. Watch Video

 

CinemaStream

Killer Wireless channels maximum bandwidth to your videos or music for a seamless, stutter-free experience. Watch Video

 

CinemaSound

Waves MaxxAudio® Pro boosts volume and clarifies every tone, so you experience studio-quality sound. Watch Video

Unite your devices with Dell Mobile Connect.

Seamless PC/smartphone integration: Access multiple devices without dividing your attention—Dell Mobile Connect pairs your iOS or Android smartphone with your laptop.

Limit disruptions: With Dell Mobile Connect, you get the option to channel notifications from phone calls, SMS, IMs and other apps right to your laptop. Keep your focus on a single screen and respond only when it’s convenient for you.

Maintain your privacy: Your phone connects to your PC via Dell Mobile Connect’s point-to-point, secure connection so your data is never exposed via unsecure internet connections.

Amazon Alexa Built-In

At home or on the go, control your day with your voice. Talking to Alexa on your PC is as easy as asking a question. Just ask and Alexa can check your calendar, create lists, play music, read the news, control your smart home and more, hands free.

Dimensions & Weight

1. Height: 0.80″ (20.23mm)| 2.Width : 13.22″ (335.9mm) | 3. Depth: 9.17 “(232.8mm) | Weight: 3.84 lbs (1.74 kg)

Ports & Slots

1. SD card | 2. USB 2.0 slot |3. Wedge-shaped lock slot | 4. Power | 5. HDMI 1.4b | 6. USB 3.1 Gen 1 | 7. USB 3.1 Gen 1 | 8. Universal audio jack

Design inspired by you

Every Inspiron is mindfully designed to ensure reliable performance over years of regular use. We’ve rigorously tested our systems to enhance your experience.

Heat and cold

Even after exposure to temperatures from as low as -40°C/°F to up to 65°C/149°F,

 

Keys and hinges

Our power buttons are tested for 40,000 presses and our keyboard keys for 5 million clicks without failure. Open, closed, or twisted—Inspiron’s base and lid have been tested tens of thousands of times.

 

Internals

We test internal connectors on components from USB to AC to batteries dozens of times to ensure lasting performance and easy replacement.

 

Essential accessories for your Inspiron 14 5000 2-in-1

Maximize the performance of your 2-in-1 with Dell-recommended essential accessories. Look for these great products and more at checkout.

 

Dell Performance USB Headset | AE2

Experience high-performance sound and crisp detail in a comfortable, lightweight headband and over-ear design with breathable, soft-leather ear cups. Omnidirectional microphone for clear communication.

Dell External USB Slim DVD+/-RW Optical Drive | DW 316

Plug this low profile, lightweight drive into your Inspiron’s USB port and you’ll be ready to play or burn your favorite CDs and DVDs.

 

Dell Power Companion Plus (18,000mAh) | PW7015L

Power and charge your PC along with your phone and tablet while on the go with the Dell Power Companion.

 

Dell Professional Sleeve 14

Keep your laptop safe and secure with a stylish, heather gray, water-resistant sleeve with handles and a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap.

 

Dell Portable SSD, USB-C 250GB

You can easily access & keep your data safe with this ultra-portable SSD storage, featuring USB type-C connectivity for up to 550MB per second transfer speed and 250GB of reliable SSD storage.

 

Dell Wireless Mouse | WM326

Reduce cable with comfortable, wireless mouse with laser tracking and long battery life
